In Candidly Cline by Kathryn Ormsbee, Cline makes up three facts about Sylvie Sharpe when she introduces her to the workshop class. Name two of them.
Answer: (1) She’s sensitive to fluorescent lights, (2) she has a cartilage piercing, and (3) she really likes naps (p. 97)

Question: In Candidly Cline by Kathryn Ormsbee, Sylvie gives Cline a list of five rock musicians to listen to. Name two of them.
Answer: Joan Jett, Stevie Nicks, Brittany Howard, Janis Joplin, Courtney Love (p. 141)
